title: BePlaying: La voz detrás del sonid
overview: This series offers exclusive access to the top DJs in the world. It delves into their personal lives and showcases the creative processes of Hernán Cattáneo, Nervo, Afrojack, Armin van Buuren, Richie Hawtin, and Carl Cox. They discuss their musical inspirations and the people who influenced them to become the successful artists they are today.
